When Jhonny is spotted by Peru' s most successful surf champion, Sofia Mulanovich, he is taken under her wing and given a chance to succeed. Yet the pressure to do so weighs hard. conversation.text: Based on your preference for movies with short runtime and directed by Nimrod Antal, I would recommend you watch "Unleashed". It is a thrilling action movie directed by Nimrod Antal and starring Phyllida Love as the tough but compassionate fight trainer, Isabelle Nélisse as her beautiful and talented daughter-in-law, Javier Botet as his tough but loving friend from childhood. The movie tells the story of two daughters who have been taught to be tough and independent by their strict and demanding mother. However, one day, their mother dies in a mysterious accident. They are left alone with their grief and confusion. But then, they receive an unexpected message from their late mother, which she had never revealed to anyone before her death. In the message, their late mother tells them that she had always been proud of them and that she loved them more than anything in this world. She also tells them that they should be proud of themselves as well and that they should always remember to love themselves first. The movie then follows the story of the two daughters, as they struggle with their grief and confusion after losing their mother, and as they learn to trust themselves again and to find the strength and courage to face their fears and overcome them for good.
